title: Death's Dark Memoir
description: In December 1864, Caroline’s afterlife takes a turn for the crazy. When her death results in her landing the job of collecting souls. Her life and death as a southern belle hasn’t prepared her for a new life of time travel, magic, and falling in love. When sparks fly with her soul collecting mentor, Jessica, she’s unsure of what to do with herself. Can living dead girls fall in love? And if they do, can it really last forever?   Since her death in 2012, Jessica’s spent centuries traveling time to collect souls. She’s haunted by a life and a lover she can’t return to. Jessica’s content to do her job and watch time pass until she meets Caroline the one woman who might be worth the risk of losing everything.   When Jessica’s past comes back to haunt their kitchen the soul collectors face a foe more frightening than Death itself. Will they piece together the clues in time to save themselves from the past that threatens to devour them?
author: Avery Taylor Adams
